fr.cnes.doi.plugin

Interface PluginConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAuthenticationPluginHelper, AbstractProjectSuffixPluginHelper, AbstractTokenDBPluginHelper, AbstractUserRolePluginHelper, DefaultLDAPImpl, DefaultProjectSuffixImpl, DefaultTokenImpl, DefaultUserRoleImpl

    public interface PluginConfiguration
    Provides validation for plugin configuration.
    Author:
    Jean-Christophe Malapert (jean-christophe.malapert@cnes.fr)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Inits the connection
      boolean isConfigured()
      Checks if the plugin is already configured
      void release()
      Release the plugin.

      Sets the configuration.
      StringBuilder validate()
      Validates the parameters in the configuration file.
